title: Dark Knight AVCHD 720p HD Bluray
description:
Included are the folders to create a dual layer AVCHD disk using Imgburn or Nero with UDF 2.5

using imgburn: 
use write files/folders to disk. 
Browse for folders and include the BDMV and the Certificate folders. 
In options tab set settings filesystem as UDF and revision to 2.5. 
Use a dual layer dvd and burn.

This will play nicely with your PS3 or any Bluray player that supports AVCHD (most do).

If you want to just stream the movie to your ps3 then just take the 00001.m2ts folder from the STREAM directory and stream it with
media sharing software such as TVersity.

Resolution is 720p mastered with high quality encoding. 
Sound is AC3 640bit.

Enjoy!
